name: MECH PUNK
description:
Mech Punk is an immersive bullet hell with frantic fast paced combat.
- Put a dozen guns on yourself and fire them all at once.
- Hoards of enemy ships and monsters trying to kill you, locals and destroy local buildings.
- Short living locals trying to rebuild their homes in real time using animal poo.
- Sell animal poo.
- Explore unique compact galaxy with its own quirks.
- Take party on Donut Planet.
- Weird characters with various political opinions.
- Black humor.
- Giant Dog Smoking Two Pipes.
